OOC: Darkfates not there and he cant recieve coms at the moment...
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Symphony/Composer/Orchestra::
> 
>     Symphony went over in a corner, he was no longer in the 
training room.  He wanted to send a message to IR through his comm-
link.
> 
>     "Iron Raptor, it's me, Symphony, is there a place that I can 
speak to you in private and in person?" Symphony asked, his 
nervousness showing in his little voice.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Composer felt like going to scout.  He needed something to do 
out of the base.
> 
>       "My Leader, may I recieve your permission to go scouting the 
area around Maximal City?" Composer asked in his usual Silverbolt-
honour voice.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Orchestra landed near, not too near though, the Alliance 
base.  He was on the edge of the island.  He was pacing back and 
forth, trying to think of something to say.  Propose an alliance with 
the alliance?  A cease-fire or share-info?  Or maybe declare war.  He 
decided to turn to the boss.
> 
>        "Commander Darkfate, posing as your faction's ambassador and 
looking to talk with the Alliance, what should I tell the Alliance?" 
Orchestra asked.
> 
> 
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ~The Keeper Of Souls~
> ~The Shadow Of The Dark~
> ~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
